handlers.code:
function epochTime(q)
    function rZ(a)
        if string.len(a) <= 1 then
            return "0" .. a
        else
            return a
        end
    end
    function dPoint(b)
        if not (b == math.floor(b)) then
            return true
        else
            return false
        end
    end
    function lYear(year)
        if not dPoint(year / 4) then
            if dPoint(year / 100) then
                return true
            else
                if not dPoint(year / 400) then
                    return true
                else
                    return false
                end
            end
        else
            return false
        end
    end
    local c = 5;
    local d = 3600; --Hour
    local e = 86400; --Day
    local f = 31536000;
    local g = 31622400;
    local h = 2419200;
    local i = 2505600;
    local j = 2592000;
    local k = 2678400;
    local l = {4, 6, 9, 11}
    local m = {1, 3, 5, 7, 8, 10, 12}
    local n = 0;
    local o = 1506816000;
    if q == nil then
        q = system.getTime()
    end
    q = q - e
    _G["formerTime"] = q
    if AddSummertimeHour == true then q = q + 3600 end
    now = math.floor(q + o)
    year = 1970;
    secs = 0;
    n = 0;
    while secs + g < now or secs + f < now do
        if lYear(year + 1) then
            if secs + g < now then
                secs = secs + g;
                year = year + 1;
                n = n + 366
            end
        else
            if secs + f < now then
                secs = secs + f;
                year = year + 1;
                n = n + 365
            end
        end
    end
    secondsRemaining = now - secs;
    monthSecs = 0;
    yearlYear = lYear(year)
    month = 1;
    while monthSecs + h < secondsRemaining or monthSecs + j < secondsRemaining or
        monthSecs + k < secondsRemaining do
        if month == 1 then
            if monthSecs + k < secondsRemaining then
                month = 2;
                monthSecs = monthSecs + k;
                n = n + 31
            else
                break
            end
        end
        if month == 2 then
            if not yearlYear then
                if monthSecs + h < secondsRemaining then
                    month = 3;
                    monthSecs = monthSecs + h;
                    n = n + 28
                else
                    break
                end
            else
                if monthSecs + i < secondsRemaining then
                    month = 3;
                    monthSecs = monthSecs + i;
                    n = n + 29
                else
                    break
                end
            end
        end
        if month == 3 then
            if monthSecs + k < secondsRemaining then
                month = 4;
                monthSecs = monthSecs + k;
                n = n + 31
            else
                break
            end
        end
        if month == 4 then
            if monthSecs + j < secondsRemaining then
                month = 5;
                monthSecs = monthSecs + j;
                n = n + 30
            else
                break
            end
        end
        if month == 5 then
            if monthSecs + k < secondsRemaining then
                month = 6;
                monthSecs = monthSecs + k;
                n = n + 31
            else
                break
            end
        end
        if month == 6 then
            if monthSecs + j < secondsRemaining then
                month = 7;
                monthSecs = monthSecs + j;
                n = n + 30
            else
                break
            end
        end
        if month == 7 then
            if monthSecs + k < secondsRemaining then
                month = 8;
                monthSecs = monthSecs + k;
                n = n + 31
            else
                break
            end
        end
        if month == 8 then
            if monthSecs + k < secondsRemaining then
                month = 9;
                monthSecs = monthSecs + k;
                n = n + 31
            else
                break
            end
        end
        if month == 9 then
            if monthSecs + j < secondsRemaining then
                month = 10;
                monthSecs = monthSecs + j;
                n = n + 30
            else
                break
            end
        end
        if month == 10 then
            if monthSecs + k < secondsRemaining then
                month = 11;
                monthSecs = monthSecs + k;
                n = n + 31
            else
                break
            end
        end
        if month == 11 then
            if monthSecs + j < secondsRemaining then
                month = 12;
                monthSecs = monthSecs + j;
                n = n + 30
            else
                break
            end
        end
    end
    day = 1;
    daySecs = 0;
    daySecsRemaining = secondsRemaining - monthSecs;
    while daySecs + e < daySecsRemaining do
        day = day + 1;
        daySecs = daySecs + e;
        n = n + 1
    end
    hour = 0;
    hourSecs = 0;
    hourSecsRemaining = daySecsRemaining - daySecs;
    while hourSecs + d < hourSecsRemaining do
        hour = hour + 1;
        hourSecs = hourSecs + d
    end
    minute = 0;
    minuteSecs = 0;
    minuteSecsRemaining = hourSecsRemaining - hourSecs;
    while minuteSecs + 60 < minuteSecsRemaining do
        minute = minute + 1;
        minuteSecs = minuteSecs + 60
    end
    second = math.floor(now % 60)
    year = rZ(year)
    month = rZ(month)
    day = rZ(day)
    hour = rZ(hour)
    minute = rZ(minute)
    second = rZ(second)

    return day.."/".. month.." "..hour..":"..minute..":"..second
end

version = "20210122-1" core = nil databank = nil screens = {} doors = {} lights = {} forceFields = {} function initPB() unit.hide() for slotName, slot in pairs(unit) do if type(slot) == "table" and type(slot.export) == "table" and slot.getElementClass then if slot.getElementClass():lower():find("coreunit") then core = slot end if slot.getElementClass():lower() == 'screenunit' then slot.slotName = slotName table.insert(screens,slot) table.sort(screens, function(left,right) return left.getId() > right.getId() end) end if slot.getElementClass():lower() == 'databankunit' then databank = slot end if slot.getElementClass():lower() == 'doorunit' then slot.slotName = slotName table.insert(doors,slot) end if slot.getElementClass():lower() == 'forcefieldunit' then slot.slotName = slotName table.insert(forceFields,slot) end if slot.getElementClass():lower() == 'lightunit' then slot.slotName = slotName table.insert(lights,slot) end end end databank.setStringValue('authorizePlayers', authorizePlayers) end function setLightsColor(r, g, b) for key, light in ipairs(lights) do light.setRGBColor(r,g,b) end end function setAuthorizeLights() setLightsColor(0, 255, 0) end function setUnAuthorizeLights() setLightsColor(255, 0, 0) end function activateLights() for key, light in ipairs(lights) do light.activate() end end function deactivateLights() setLightsColor(0, 0, 0) for key, light in ipairs(lights) do light.deactivate() end end function activateDoors() for key, door in ipairs(doors) do door.activate() end for key, forceField in ipairs(forceFields) do forceField.deactivate() end end function deactivateDoors() for key, door in ipairs(doors) do door.deactivate() end for key, forceField in ipairs(forceFields) do forceField.activate() end end function openDoors() local playerName = playerDetected.name if checkAuthorize(playerName) then updateScreen('Welcome
'..playerName..'!', '#4f0', nil, '#3a941a', '#4f0') activateDoors() setAuthorizeLights() else setUnAuthorizeLights() updateScreen('Access Denied
'..playerName..'!') end logPlayerDetection(playerDetected) end function closeDoors() updateScreen('Waiting for authentication') deactivateDoors() setUnAuthorizeLights() end function checkAuthorize(name) if not(databank.hasKey('authorizePlayers')) then system.print('Ajouter les droits') end local authorizePlayers = json.decode(databank.getStringValue('authorizePlayers')) for key, authorizePlayer in ipairs(authorizePlayers) do if name:lower() == authorizePlayer.name:lower() then return true end end return false end function logPlayerDetection(player) local logPlayers = json.decode(databank.getStringValue('logPlayers')) if logPlayers == nil then logPlayers = {} end local findPlayer = false for key, logPlayer in ipairs(logPlayers) do if player.id == logPlayer.id then logPlayer.time = system.getTime() logPlayer.isAuthorize = checkAuthorize(player.name) findPlayer = true break end end if not(findPlayer) then table.insert(logPlayers, { id = player.id, name = player.name, time = system.getTime(), isAuthorize = checkAuthorize(player.name) }) end table.sort(logPlayers, function(left, right) return left.time > right.time end) -- Limit to 15 rows logPlayers = {table.unpack(logPlayers, 1, 15)} databank.setStringValue('logPlayers', json.encode(logPlayers)) updateScreenAdmin() end
